[`RelativeDateValue`](RelativeDateValue)

## RelativeDateValue class

[Value](Value) wrapping a Date. RelativeDateValue behaves the same as a [DateValue](DateValue) however it renders as a time relative to now.

 1.10.0

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class RelativeDateValue extends DateValue 
```
**Extends:** [`DateValue`](DateValue)
